title: Teb Factoring
overview: Factoring transactions are quickly and reliably now with TEB Factoring App. Application allows you to upload your bills and invoices and helps to follow progress with your related uploads
spotTitle: Application allows you to upload your bills and invoices and helps to follow progress with your related uploads.
spotDesc: The end result was a web/mobile app that solved problems of user, and user can apply quicker by using application. It also ended up being a great opportunity to learn new hybrid frameworks such as Cordova, creating f/e structure, and introducing myself to mobile app development.
